languages.text:
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant gains +10% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit chance{/g}.
When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text:
Атакуя цель, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} которой снижено союзниками архмилитанта с помощью каких-либо эффектов, архмилитант получает +10% к {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}шансу критического попадания{/g}.
Атакуя цель, {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирование{/g} которой уменьшено союзниками архмилитанта с помощью каких-либо эффектов, архмилитант наносит на 20% больше критического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
When the Veteran attacks targets with dodge reduced by the effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran gains +10% critical hit chance.
When the Veteran attacks targets with parry reduced by the effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran deals +20% critical damage.

When the Veteran attacks targets that have their dodge reduced by any effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran gains +10% critical hit chance.
When the Veteran attacks targets that have their parry reduced by ant effects applied by the Veteran's allies, the Veteran deals +20% critical damage.

When the Arch-Militant attacks targets that have their {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parry{/g} reduced by any effects applied by the Arch-Militant's allies, the Arch-Militant deals +20% critical {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text:
当首席战士攻击时，如果目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}由于首席战士盟友造成的任何效果而降低，首席战士此次攻击的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击率{/g}提高10%。
当首席战士攻击时，如果目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}由于首席战士盟友造成的任何效果而降低，首席战士此次攻击的暴击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高20%。

languages.text:
Cuando el Archimilitante ataca a un objetivo cuya {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} haya sido reducida por los efectos aplicados por sus aliados, el Archimilitante gana +10 % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}probabilidad de impacto crítico{/g}.
Cuando el Archimilitante ataca a un objetivo cuya {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parada{/g} haya sido reducida por los efectos aplicados por sus aliados, el Archimilitante inflige +20 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} crítico.

languages.text:

味方が付与した効果により{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}が減少したターゲットを攻撃した場合、アーク・ミリタントのクリティカル{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+20%増加する。

languages.text:
Wenn der Erzmilitant Ziele angreift, deren {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} von Effekten reduziert wird, deren Ursprung die Verbündeten des Erzmilitanten sind, erhält der Erzmilitant +10 % {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritische Trefferchance{/g}.
Wenn der Erzmilitant Ziele angreift, deren {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}Parieren{/g} von Effekten reduziert wird, deren Ursprung die Verbündeten des Erzmilitanten sind, fügt der Erzmilitant +20 % kritischen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
